Package chess

Class Chess

java.lang.Object
chess.Chess
public class Chess
extends java.lang.Object
Chess class represent the actual game include initialize an empty board and manage the game play

    • Chess

      public Chess()

  • Method Details

    • ifValidMove

      public static boolean ifValidMove​(Board table, java.lang.String target, java.lang.String dest, boolean isWhite, java.lang.String promote)
      ifValidMove method return a boolean value that indicate whether a command is valid
      Parameters:
      table - table passes through the current game board
      target - cell that need to be moved
      dest - destination cell
      isWhite - boolean value that indicate the color of player
      promote - String that indicate promote rule
      Returns:
      boolean value that indicate whether a command is valid

    • move

      public static void move​(Board table, java.lang.String target, java.lang.String dest)
      move target piece to destination, including promote pawn and castling
      Parameters:
      table - Current chess board
      target - a String that indicate the location of target piece
      dest - a String that indicate the location of destination piece

    • empasingUpdate

      public static void empasingUpdate​(Board table)
      Update en passant status of current board. Each cell have a en passant value, if it's 2, means the pawn can be captured by en passant. If it's 3, means pawn can no longer be captured by en passant.
      Parameters:
      table - current board

    • ifCheck

      public static boolean ifCheck​(Board table, boolean whiteMove) throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
      Check if current player's move put the other player into check.
      Parameters:
      table - current board
      whiteMove - indicate the most recent player that moves, true for white, false for black
      Returns:
      boolean value that indicate if this move put the other player into check
      Throws:
      java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - clone board not supported

    • tryEveryMove

      public static boolean tryEveryMove​(Board table, int row, int col, boolean whiteMove) throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
      Check if certain piece's next move can capture enemy's King.
      Parameters:
      table - current board
      row - row number of that piece
      col - col number of that piece
      whiteMove - color of that piece
      Returns:
      true if that piece can capture enemy's King, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - clone board not supported

    • ifCheckmate

      public static boolean ifCheckmate​(Board table, boolean whiteMove) throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
      Check if current player's move put the other player into checkmate. This method is called when one player put the other player into check. The other player need to find a way to escape from check. If there are no way to escape, return true
      Parameters:
      table - current board
      whiteMove - color of current player
      Returns:
      true if current player checkmate the other player, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - Clone board can not be done

    • moveAndCheck

      public static boolean moveAndCheck​(Board table, int row, int col, boolean whiteMove) throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
      Let certain piece move to a valid location and see if the move can save their own King from being check.
      Parameters:
      table - current board
      row - row number of the piece
      col - column number of the piece
      whiteMove - color of of the piece
      Returns:
      true if can escape, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - error

    • updateCheck

      public static void updateCheck​(Board table, boolean whiteMove, boolean update)
      Find the King of given color, update King's underCheck to given boolean
      Parameters:
      table - current table
      whiteMove - true for white, false for black
      update - boolean need to be update

    • stringConvert

      public static java.lang.String stringConvert​(int row, int col)
      String covert method that convert row number and col number to String. For example, row 1 col 0 is "a2"
      Parameters:
      row - given row number
      col - given column number
      Returns:
      String that can be parse by other method

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
      Main process that manage the game. Including initializing chess board, parse user input, check if move is valid, check if move can put themself into check, update en passant value, check if check, check if checkmate, parse draw and resign.
      Parameters:
      args - default input
      Throws:
      java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - Clone has error
